thread.title: Yemen's Aden airport gets 1st commercial flight in over 4 months - @Reuters
thread.title_full: Yemen's Aden airport gets 1st commercial flight in over 4 months - @Reuters

author: Rebecca Bratek
title: Yemen's Aden airport gets 1st commercial flight in over 4 months - @Reuters
text: Aug. 06, 2015 | 01:50 PM (Last updated: August 06, 2015 | 03:30 PM) Aden gets first commercial flight in over four months A picture taken on August 5, 2015, shows the Al-Anad airbase in the southern Lahj governorate, some 50 kilometres north of the Yemeni Red Sea port of Aden, a day after the key military base was retaken from Shiite Huthi fighters by pro-government forces. Advancing loyalist forces recaptured Yemen's biggest airbase from Iran-backed rebels on August 4, 2015, after a 24-hour assault using heavy armour supplied by a Saudi-led coalition. AFP PHOTO / SALEH AL-OBEIDI
